channel.title: Replacement AC Adapter for JVC GR-D370U Camcorder
channel.description:
Hello!
In various moves, I have completely lost the AC power adapter for my old camcorder, a [url='https://support.jvc.com/consumer/product.jsp?archive=true&pathId=26&modelId=MODL027626']JVC GR-D370U[/url]. I am looking to purchase a replacement but, due to the camcorder's age, I can't find a replacement on JVC's website.
All I can find when I do searches online is one by [url='https://www.buy.com/prod/hqrp-ac-power-adapter-for-jvc-gr-d370u-grd370u-camcorder-euro-adapter/212238636.html']something called HQRP by Osprey-Talon[/url]. Yay or nay?
Or, preferable, even if I have to spend some more money, I'd like to get one made by JVC as I'm wary about third party manufacturers like this.
Any help on this matter would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Replacement AC Adapter for JVC GR-D370U Camcorder
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
My chargers get broken all the time and it can be a bitch to find replacements.

Read full topic
item.source: Replacement AC Adapter for JVC GR-D370U Camcorder

item.title: Replacement AC Adapter for JVC GR-D370U Camcorder
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Well, this is awkward.

After searching for hours, I decided to post this thread. And, soon thereafter, I found where to get a genuine JVC replacement adapter. Frack. Oh well, money plunked down, delivery by about Wednesday. I’m happy.

Read full topic
item.source: Replacement AC Adapter for JVC GR-D370U Camcorder

item.title: Replacement AC Adapter for JVC GR-D370U Camcorder
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
looks just like the one I got from a pawn shop a few years ago without a charger, the only thing that worked was the AC adapter from a NES system (10v) with a power plug from a cordless phone station.

Read full topic

item.title: Replacement AC Adapter for JVC GR-D370U Camcorder

item.description:
Hello!

In various moves, I have completely lost the AC power adapter for my old camcorder, a JVC GR-D370U. I am looking to purchase a replacement but, due to the camcorder’s age, I can’t find a replacement on JVC’s website.

All I can find when I do searches online is one by something called HQRP by Osprey-Talon. Yay or nay?

Or, preferable, even if I have to spend some more money, I’d like to get one made by JVC as I’m wary about third party manufacturers like this.

Any help on this matter would be greatly appreciated.
